text: jab unake paas nishchintata ya bhay kee koee baat pahuchatee hai to use phaila dete hai, haalaanki agar ve use rasool aur apane samudaay ke utaradaayee vyaktiyon tak pahunchaate to use ve log jaan lete jo unamen usakee jaanch kar sakate hai. aur yadi tumapar allaah ka udaar anugrah aur usakee dayaaluta na hotee, to thode logon ke siva tum sab shaitaan ke peechhe chalane lag jaate
